flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at .1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4.0>>4.0
He has to run 2 miles without the album because 6 - 4.0 = <<6-4.0=5.0>>5.0
Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 1/15
He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because 5.0 / (4/60) = <<5.0/(4/60)=75.0>>75.0
It will take him 70 minutes in total because 40 + 75.0 =<<40+75.0=115.0>>115.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.0, not 5.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
